name: Reknum: Origins Collection
overview: Get ready to experience classic gaming with the Reknum Origins Collection. Includes PLOID SAGA, REKNUM CHERI DREAMLAND and REKNUM DX. PLOID Saga: Combines PLOIDS Alpha and Omega games, an evolution of the human race created by fusing technology with its DNA. In VOID + and its sequel PLOID, these heroes must travel through time in search of sacred artifacts that will help them defeat aliens trying to invade Earth. PLOID Saga also includes the shoot’em Up Uchusen and Uchusen 2 minigames. Take out those aliens in true retro style! Reknum Cheri Dreamland: Princess Cheri has been trapped in the world of dreams. In this retro style platformer, Princess Cheri explores, unlocks weapons, upgrades her skills, fights fearsome bosses, and attempts to save the kingdom by following the poetic words of her ancestors. Reknum DX: An improved version of the original Reknum retro platformer. Includes new character sprites, a HUD and a fully remastered world in HD, new mechanics and an extended story to explain her connection to the PLOIDS and the ending of the adventure.
